message.content:
Subject: Notice of Resignation - [Your Name]

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. After much consideration, I have made the decision to leave [Company Name] and move on to a new opportunity that will provide me with different challenges and experiences in my career path. This was not an easy decision for me, as I have greatly valued working with you and the entire team here at [Company].

My last day of work will be [Date], in order to give sufficient notice and ensure a smooth transition for my colleagues. I would like to offer my assistance during this time to help train my replacement or provide any other support that may be needed. 

Please let me know if there is anything specific you would like me to do before I leave, such as wrapping up ongoing projects or projects that are in progress. Additionally, please let me know if you would prefer a written report or presentation on the status of my work.

I want to express my gratitude for the opportunities and support provided by [Company Name] during my time here. It has been an incredible experience, and I have learned so much from working with such talented individuals. If there is any way that I can be of assistance in the coming weeks or if you need a reference in the future, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Thank you for understanding and supporting me throughout my time at [Company Name].

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
